nodes.bodyText: question for @dnhutchins : why is this code starting at line 317 so different from the block of code at line 296?
I'm not too familiar with this code. Conceptually it makes sense. Would it be appropriate to move this submitNoCheck click into the leaveAssessment() routine?
i think leaveAssessment() is for when the assessment was already submitted by the back-end java timer
